label: Opener
description: The standard MCH opener front-loads all tool cooldowns under raid buffs, deploys Automaton Queen at high Battery, then enters Hypercharge + Wildfire for maximum burst damage.

steps.reasoning: Use before the pull to guarantee a critical direct hit on Drill. Pre-pull usage doesn't waste GCD time.
Highest-potency single-target tool (580). Opens with Reassembled Drill for a guaranteed crit+dhit opener hit.
Instantly generates 50 Heat and grants Full Metal Field Ready. Starts the 120s cooldown aligned with Wildfire.
Start the 1-2-3 combo to build Heat between tools. Generates 5 Heat gauge.
Spend a charge of Double Check. 3 charges available — weave between GCDs to avoid overcapping charges.
Second combo hit. 300 potency when comboed. Generates 5 Heat.
Spend a charge of Checkmate. Alternate with Double Check to drain both charge pools evenly.
Third combo hit — highest combo potency (380). Generates 5 Heat and 10 Battery.
580 potency tool. Generates 20 Battery. Use on cooldown — never delay tools.
Second charge of Reassemble. Buff the next weaponskill (Chain Saw) for guaranteed crit+dhit.
Continue spending Double Check charges between GCDs. Don't let charges overcap.
580 potency tool under Reassemble. Generates 20 Battery and grants Excavator Ready.
Follow-up to Chain Saw — 580 potency, generates 20 Battery. Must be used while Excavator Ready is active.
Deploy Queen at 70 Battery for high potency. Queen damage snapshots raid buffs active at deployment time.
Attach Wildfire to the boss. Deals 240 potency per weaponskill hit during its 10s duration. Target 6 hits.
Buffer GCD before Hypercharge. Avoids triple-weaving Queen + Wildfire + Hypercharge. Counts as Wildfire hit 1 and generates 5 Heat.
Spend 50 Heat to enter Hypercharge. Enables 5 Blazing Shots at 1.5s GCD — single weave only during this window.
First Hypercharge GCD. 220 potency on a 1.5s recast. Generates 5 Battery. Wildfire hit 2.
Single weave between Blazing Shots. Hypercharge's 1.5s GCD only allows one oGCD per window.
Second Hypercharge GCD. Continue building Wildfire stacks and Battery. Wildfire hit 3.
Alternate Double Check and Checkmate weaves to spend charges evenly.
Third Hypercharge GCD. Wildfire hit 4.
Continue alternating oGCD charges during Hypercharge.
Fourth Hypercharge GCD. Wildfire hit 5.
Final oGCD weave during Hypercharge. Spend remaining charges.
Fifth and final Hypercharge GCD. Wildfire hit 6. Hypercharge ends after this.
580 potency finisher. Uses Full Metal Field Ready from Barrel Stabilizer. Wildfire has detonated for maximum 1440 potency.
Drill comes off cooldown (20s). Use immediately — never delay tools.
